channel.title: Identity on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Identity on Ex Machina

item.title: The Evolution of Identity
item.description: Anonymity on the internet allows trolls to operate without filters - leaving them free to plumb depths that they would not have been able to in real life. Voluntarily identifying oneself in order to ensure that the content you put out is directly associated with your identity offers.

item.title: The Stiff Backbone of the Aadhaar Act
item.description: While it is not without its flaws, the Aadhaar Act imposes some of the strongest fetters on government over-reach of any legislation in the country.
